LanguageData.Dissection_ExpSetting_desc: The amount of exp a default corpse yields (before calculating the individual corpse exp).
LanguageData.Dissection_DurationSetting_desc: The time in ingame hours to dissect a single corpse.
LanguageData.Dissection_DailyLimitSetting_desc: If activated, dissection will not count towards the daily learning threshold (4000) and the experience will not be reduced to 20% after this limit is reached.
